metadata.title: RS Pure by Ross-Simons 14kt Yellow Gold 2-Band Open-Space Ring
features: Polished open-space 14kt yellow gold ring for women. 1/4" wide. Size 8. Handcrafted piece. Includes jewelry presentation box and 30-day, 100% money-back guarantee.

14KT YELLOW GOLD OPEN SPACE RING: This dainty 14kt yellow gold ring achieves the layered look without weighing you down. This handcrafted two-band ring for women is a new essentialâ€”it looks like two rings when it is really only one! Perfectly complements your other rings with a subtle feminine flair.

ROSS-SIMONS QUALITY: Treat yourself to the luxury and beauty of Ross-Simons fine jewelry. Whether in 14kt gold, 18kt gold, or gorgeous sterling silver, our finely crafted jewelry is an unforgettable, unique gift for women.

ROSS-SIMONS IS a trusted name in fine jewelry for 65 years and counting. From elegant 14kt gold bangles to tennis bracelets and byzantine necklaces to classic gold hoop earrings and diamond stud earrings, we offer fine jewelry for women for every occasion.

GIVE THE GIFT OF JEWELRY: A timeless and traditional holiday or anniversary gift for a woman or girl of any age, Ross-Simons jewelry in luminous 14kt gold, 18kt gold, or .925 sterling silver, is the perfect gift to let her know just how much you care.
description: Ross-Simons is always looking for new ways to reinvent essential jewelry styles. Two bands, one new look. The open-space trend is still going strong. In fine 14kt gold, this handcrafted ring has lasting appeal. The two parallel bands connect in back. 14kt yellow gold ring. Each Ross-Simons item arrives in a fine jewelry presentation box. Shop Ross-Simons jewelry risk-free as all items include a 30-day, 100% money-back guarantee.
